20101207193359.333|20101207193401.000|CCO|HELD HARMLESS BUT THAT WE DON'T 
20101207193401.000|20101207193402.667|CCO|MAKE THESE BUSH TAX CUTS 
20101207193402.667|20101207193404.333|CCO|PERMANENT FOR WEALTHY 
20101207193404.333|20101207193406.000|CCO|INDIVIDUALS BECAUSE IT WAS 
20101207193406.000|20101207193407.667|CCO|GOING TO COST THE COUNTRY AT A 
20101207193407.667|20101207193409.333|CCO|TIME WHEN WE GOT THESE LOOMING 
20101207193409.333|20101207193411.000|CCO|DEFICITS, THAT THAT WAS THE 
20101207193411.000|20101207193414.333|CCO|BETTER POSITION TO TAKE.
20101207193414.333|20101207193417.667|CCO|AND THE AMERICAN PEOPLE WERE 
20101207193417.667|20101207193421.000|CCO|PERSUADED BY THAT.
20101207193421.000|20101207193423.500|CCO|BUT I HAVEN'T PERSUADED MITCH 
20101207193423.500|20101207193426.000|CCO|MCCONNELL AND I HAVEN'T 
20101207193426.000|20101207193428.500|CCO|PERSUADED BOEHNER.
20101207193428.500|20101207193431.000|CCO|THEN I HAVE TO LOOK AT WHAT'S 
20101207193431.000|20101207193433.500|CCO|THE BEST FOR THE REALITY AND 
20101207193433.500|20101207193436.000|CCO|FOR THE JOBS.
20101207193436.000|20101207193438.500|CCO|>> THANK YOU, MR. PRESIDENT.
20101207193438.500|20101207193451.000|CCO|BACK IN JULY, YOUR BUDGET 
20101207193451.000|20101207193456.000|CCO|OFFICE.
20101207193456.000|20101207193501.000|CCO|>> THIS IS NOT AS SIGNIFICANT 
20101207193501.000|20101207193503.000|CCO|OF A BOOST TO THE ECONOMY AS 
20101207193503.000|20101207193505.000|CCO|THE RECOVERY ACT WAS BUT WE'RE 
20101207193505.000|20101207193507.000|CCO|IN A DIFFERENT POSITION THEN.
20101207193507.000|20101207193509.000|CCO|WHEN THE ECONOMY PASSED, WE 
20101207193509.000|20101207193511.000|CCO|WERE LOOKING AT A GREAT 
20101207193511.000|20101207193512.250|CCO|DEPRESSION AND WE MIGHT HAVE 
20101207193512.250|20101207193513.500|CCO|SEEN UNEMPLOYMENT AT 15%, 20%, 
20101207193513.500|20101207193514.750|CCO|WE DON'T KNOW.
20101207193514.750|20101207193516.000|CCO|IN COMBINATION WITH THE WORK WE 
20101207193516.000|20101207193517.250|CCO|DID IN STABILIZING THE 
20101207193517.250|20101207193518.500|CCO|FINANCIAL SYSTEM, THE WORK THE 
20101207193518.500|20101207193519.750|CCO|FEDERAL RESERVE DID, THAT'S 
20101207193519.750|20101207193521.000|CCO|BEHIND US NOW.
20101207193521.000|20101207193523.500|CCO|WE DON'T HAVE THE DANGER OF A 
20101207193523.500|20101207193526.000|CCO|DOUBLE DIP RECESSION.
20101207193526.000|20101207193528.500|CCO|WHAT WE HAVE IS A SITUATION IN 
20101207193528.500|20101207193531.000|CCO|WHICH THE ECONOMY, ALTHOUGH 
20101207193531.000|20101207193533.000|CCO|GROWING, ALTHOUGH PROFITS ARE 
20101207193533.000|20101207193535.000|CCO|UP, WE'RE SEEING SOME JOB 
20101207193535.000|20101207193537.000|CCO|GROWTH IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR, 
20101207193537.000|20101207193539.000|CCO|THE ECONOMY IS NOT GROWING FAST 
20101207193539.000|20101207193541.000|CCO|ENOUGH TO DRIVE DOWN THE 
20101207193541.000|20101207193542.667|CCO|UNEMPLOYMENT RATE GIVEN THE 
20101207193542.667|20101207193544.333|CCO|EIGHT MILLION JOBS THAT WERE 
20101207193544.333|20101207193546.000|CCO|LOST BEFORE I CAME INTO OFFICE 
20101207193546.000|20101207193547.667|CCO|AND JUST AS I WAS COMING INTO 
20101207193547.667|20101207193549.333|CCO|OFFICE.
20101207193549.333|20101207193551.000|CCO|SO WHAT THIS PACKAGE DOES IS 
20101207193551.000|20101207193552.667|CCO|PROVIDE AN ADDITIONAL BOOST 
20101207193552.667|20101207193554.333|CCO|THAT IS SUBSTANTIALLY MORE 
20101207193554.333|20101207193556.000|CCO|SIGNIFICANT THAN I THINK MOST 
20101207193556.000|20101207193557.667|CCO|ECONOMIC FORECASTERS HAD 
20101207193557.667|20101207193559.333|CCO|EXPECTED.

20101207193601.000|20101207193602.667|CCO|SOME JUST OVER THE LAST 24 
20101207193602.667|20101207193604.333|CCO|HOURS SUGGEST THAT WE MAY SEE

20101207193619.000|20101207193621.000|CCO|RECOVERY THAT WE HAVE CONTINUES

20101207194259.333|20101207194301.000|CCO|GUY IS GOING TO BULLDOZE HIS

20101207194303.500|20101207194306.000|CCO|THAT'S MY POINT.
20101207194306.000|20101207194308.500|CCO|MY POINT IS I DON'T MAKE 
20101207194308.500|20101207194311.000|CCO|JUDGMENTS BASED ON WHAT THE 
20101207194311.000|20101207194312.667|CCO|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM IS AT ANY 
20101207194312.667|20101207194314.333|CCO|GIVEN TIME.
20101207194314.333|20101207194316.000|CCO|I MAKE MY JUDGMENTS BASED ON 
20101207194316.000|20101207194317.667|CCO|WHAT I THINK IS RIGHT FOR THE 
20101207194317.667|20101207194319.333|CCO|COUNTRY AND THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194319.333|20101207194321.000|CCO|RIGHT NOW.
20101207194321.000|20101207194323.000|CCO|AND I WILL BE HAPPY TO SEE THE 
20101207194323.000|20101207194325.000|CCO|REPUBLICANS TEST WHETHER OR NOT 
20101207194325.000|20101207194327.000|CCO|I'M ITCHING FOR A FIGHT ON A 
20101207194327.000|20101207194329.000|CCO|WHOLE RANGE OF ISSUES.
20101207194329.000|20101207194331.000|CCO|I SUSPECT THEY WILL FIND I AM.
20101207194331.000|20101207194333.500|CCO|AND I THINK THE AMERICAN PEOPLE 
20101207194333.500|20101207194336.000|CCO|WILL BE ON MY SIDE ON A WHOLE

20101207194338.500|20101207194341.000|CCO|BUT RIGHT NOW I WANT TO MAKE
